product_name: Trails Illustrated Moab South Trail Map
long_description: This beautifully rendered Trails Illustrated folded map offers detailed coverage of the areas south of Moab, Utah. Provides valuable wilderness tips and Leave No Trace guidelines, along with updated trails, trailheads, points of interest, campgrounds and much more. Printed on waterproof, tear-resistant material with a plastic coating that offers the durability needed for outdoor use. Includes selected waypoints in both Lat./Lon. and UTM coordinate systems as well as GPS-compatible UTM grid lines for easy navigation. Measures 9.25 x 4.25 in. folded and 37.75 x 25.5 in. fully opened; scale of 1:70,000. National Geographic Maps; copyright 2004.
short_description: This beautifully rendered Trails Illustrated folded map offers detailed coverage of the areas south of Moab, Utah.
